channel.title: SW-FRAMEWORK-Keras on Memo
channel.description: Recent content in SW-FRAMEWORK-Keras on Memo

item.description: Concept Keras is a high-level neural network API built on Theano or Tensorflow. Compared with TensorFlow and pytorch and other packages, keras is more suitable for beginners who want to quickly experience machine learning Because keras is a high-level neural network API, it is less suitable for some low-level changes, and it is more difficult to learn the principles behind neural networks in depth. If you have the foundation of deep learning, or if you have more time, you can go to Tensorflow or pytorch for teaching
